Tata Consultancy Service
Duration: Nov, 16 to till date

Profile: Data science Engineer
Client: Office Depot
Project: Office Dep Opt ADM  
Process overview:  Optumera is a Digital Merchandising Solution that harnesses the power of Big Data analytics, and ML prescriptive algorithms to respond to evolving consumer and market trends. Leverages over 500 data sources with advanced algorithms to localize and right-size store space categories and simulate store space changes to de-risk expensive investments. Analyses shopper behavior, missions, trips, decision hierarchies, demand transfer, preferences. Leverages computer vision and artificial intelligence to align with customer expectations and enhance shelf performance and in store shelf execution. Helps fashion retailers to ideate, collaborate and negotiate with vendors, merchants, designers, fashionistas, and shoppers.
Roles and Responsibilities:
· Fulfilled all data science duties for a high-end capital management firm.

· Design and modeling for statistical analysis and prediction on huge unstructured and structured data.

· Built fuzzy matching algorithm using k-nearest neighbors to identify non-exact matching duplicates.

· Applying model selection on prepared data based on highest accuracy.

· Designed and developed real time recommendation engine to rank sales leads for upsell opportunities

· Used Python and Pig to scrape, hive to clean, and analyze large datasets

· Created machine learning models with Python and scikit-learn to predict marketing strategy, buildings with 98% accuracy

· Constructed a review model to accomplish the expectation and trend of customer

· Model consist of multilayer neural network to predict the sales of organization based on product and location.
Tools and technology: ML, NLP, Python, Numpy, Pandas, Sci-Kit Learn, NLTK, Seaborn, Statistical Analysis

Hands on Experience:

Project: Determining Quality of hotels and market trend:
An organization was planning to increase their business by investing money in OYO rooms in Hyderabad, before investing the huge money, they wanted to get more information about OYO rooms and their hotels.

Asked to get the review of all the hotels also to predict the review of new hotels, which will be built in future. Performed data analysis technique to get information about hotels where it have good reviews and bad reviews.

How OYO rooms can make profit in future.
Roles and Responsibilities: 

· Constructed a model which can read and clean the text to perform the ML algorithms

· Model showed excellent performance to extract information from given context

· Two models were built with python, numpy, panda, NLTK, Sci-kit learn

· Sparse vector and count vectorization technique added to build the model

· Algorithm was implemented using Python in Machine learning platform

· Dropout technique was used to prevent the model from overfitting.
Tools and technology: ML, NLP, Python, Sci-Kit Learn
